homeSnippet.church1: We are wating for you at the
homeSnippet.church2: Holy Church of Saints Cyril and Methodius.
homeSnippet.venue1: After the ceremony you are all invited to our party at the

gift.title: Send a Gift
gift.line1: Your presence on this important day is the most beautiful gift for us.
gift.line2: However, since many of you have asked and wish to contribute to our new beginning as a family, we have created a joint bank account.
